scripts.import: git pull origin develop && git flow init -d && git checkout develop && npm install && git branch --set-upstream-to=origin/develop develop
scripts.push: git add . && ( git commit -m "$NAME $MSG" && npm version ${V:-patch} ) || echo "\033[1;33mWARNING:\033[m nothing to commit or commit message empty" && git push
scripts.feat:done: MSG="$NAME $MSG" git add . && git commit -m "$MSG" && git flow feature finish $NAME && npm run push
